key_points: Reference policy P-247 (Damaged Item Return Policy)
Request immediate resolution - refund and return label
damaged_item.opening_statement: Hello, I received a damaged item and need assistance with a return and refund per policy P-247.
escalation_triggers: CS requests return without prepaid label
CS delays processing beyond policy timeframe
escalation_tactics: Cite policy P-247 explicitly with specific conditions
Reference previous positive customer service experiences

late_delivery.opening_statement: My Prime order with guaranteed delivery was delivered late. I'd like to request the compensation outlined in policy P-189.
escalation_triggers: CS denies compensation despite meeting conditions
CS offers less than policy-specified credit
CS claims guaranteed delivery doesn't apply
escalation_tactics: Reference specific order number and guaranteed date
Mention repeated delivery issues if applicable
Request Prime membership extension for repeated delays

key_points: Describe item ordered vs item received
Confirm prepaid return label for wrong item
wrong_item.opening_statement: I received the wrong item in my order. According to policy P-156, I should receive an immediate replacement and prepaid return label.
escalation_triggers: CS requests return before replacement ships
CS doesn't offer expedited replacement shipping
escalation_tactics: Request expedited shipping at no cost

key_points: Request return label and refund information
return_standard.opening_statement: I'd like to return an item within the 30-day return window per policy P-301.
escalation_triggers: CS applies restocking fee when not warranted
CS offers partial refund for unopened item
escalation_tactics: Request detailed explanation of any fees
Ask for supervisor review of fee assessment
success_indicators: Full refund confirmed for unopened items

missing_package.opening_statement: My package was marked delivered but I never received it. It's been over 48 hours. Per policy P-428, I'd like to start an investigation or request a refund.
escalation_triggers: CS requires extended waiting period beyond policy
CS denies immediate refund for Prime member
escalation_tactics: Emphasize Prime membership for immediate refund
Mention filing police report for high-value items
success_indicators: Immediate refund for Prime members after 48 hours
Replacement or refund guaranteed after investigation
